tool_description: The Credential Verification service will assist you in discovering and inspecting an email's security breaches, made public by attackers.
name: Credential Verification
title: Credential Verification

api_list.name: CredentialVerification
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://credential-verification.p.rapidapi.com/restpeopleMOB/MA/MaWcf.svc/Makshouf"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "credential-verification.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
